body: I Think This is a bug, because, when there was mczone we would get like 1000 XP Every 10 seconds.

title: Nebula Titans No XP?

replies.body:
Do you mean XP for prestige?
Or for enchanting items? Because enchantments have been removed on that map.

replies.body: You don't have your xp bar anymore, you can see your level when you kill someone or when you are spectating.

replies.body: I think they've changed the YAML (YML? idk) so that you start with 48 enchanting bottles now. Correct me if I'm wrong, though.
